short_description: kjc architects is an architects & architectural services company based in carshalton, united kingdom.
long_description: kjc architects offer a personalised service to discerning clients who seek exceptional quality and attention to detail. our creative process is a collaboration between client and designer. working closely with our clients ensures our design is informed by the demands and aspirations of their lifestyle. we firmly believe that good design can improve the quality of life as well as add value to your property. with this in mind, we sensitively refurbish period properties for contemporary living, design timeless new buildings including subterranean extensions under houses or gardens, and create spaces that you want to live and work in. we work with a wide range of suppliers and fabricators to assist our clients in getting the best results. we develop the town planning drawings into detailed drawings and create a detailed specification to submit for building control approval. we use jct & riba contracts for our projects which are recogni s ed throughout the industry. this gives client's piece of mind that they are getting what they paid for.
business_tags: interior design | contract administration | 3d modelling | interior designing services | local councils | rear extensions | building control applications | detail design | planning applications | controller's office | design & planning | building regulations | structural engineers | permitted development | commercial developments | design work | town plan | extensions & lofts | contemporary living | floor finishing | sanitary wares | house mixes
generated_description: kjc architects, legally known as kjc architects ltd., is an architectural practice based in carshalton, england. the company specializes in a wide range of projects, including small domestic projects, mixed-use housing, side and rear extensions, loft conversions, hospitality, education, and community facilities. kjc architects is known for its high-quality bespoke architecture, tailored to client briefs, and emphasizes creative and modern design while being sensitive to existing structures. the firm prides itself on excellent customer service, flexibility, and attention to detail, working closely with clients to ensure their design aspirations are met.
